feed.title: PyCon Israel 2024 - announcements
feed.subtitle: PyCon Israel is a conference dedicated to the Python programming language, related technologies, and their use.

entry.title: PyCon Israel 2024 Agenda Published
entry.content:
PyCon Israel is proud to present the agenda for the 2024 conference. This agenda is the result of long hours of work -- by the submitters of proposals which were chosen, and proposals which weren't; by reviewers, and by the conference team.

The agenda includes an opening panel, 27 talks and five workshops. We believe it reflects our commitments to excellent content and to the local community.

Go check it out! We expect tickets to be available later this week.
